transcript:
Customer: Hello khao.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha bolo.
Executive: Ha Ankita mam Himanshu baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se good morning.
Customer: Ha sir bolo.
Executive: Accha abhi Vivek se discussion ho rahi thi na apni TrustSeal ke regarding aur final do saal ka unhone price bhi aapko de diya hai 38000 plus GST 44840 jo ki service extend ho jayegi aapki 2027 tak.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute suno suno sir aap ek bar detail me mujhe bolo kya bol rahe hai aap.
Executive: Detail me?
Customer: Sir aap kya book kis bare me baat kar rahe ho sir wo service lene ke bare me.
Executive: Ya.
Customer: Ha ha subscription jo TrustSeal ki baat hui thi uske regarding.
Executive: Ha sir se baat hui thi aapki okay.
Customer: Ha ha sir se baat hui thi ji ji ji.
Executive: To wo ek madam thi Nita ya unse baat hui thi hamari.
Customer: Tanushree Chaurasia.
Executive: Ha Tanu Tanu Tanu ha Tanu madam.
Customer: Ha ha Tanu Chaurasia ji ji unka senior baat kar raha hu ji.
Executive: To un uske regarding aap baat kar rahe hai kya abhi.
Executive: Ha ha usi ke regarding ji.
Customer: Ha to sir aaj karane wale hai lekin aaj actually sir ka bhi office time hai to sir 4 4 pm ke baad me aapse wo baat karenge aur kuch hua sir ka to sir baat karenge aapse matlab sir hi call karenge aaj karne wale the sir service matlab conversion.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Ha to lekin abhi sir available karne wale hai ya karne wale the aap keh rahe ho the.
Executive: Karne wale the.
Executive: Karne nahi nahi sir karne wale hai karne wale hai actually na sir ki baat hui thi aapse isliye mujhe detail me nahi pata sir ne bola tha ki aaj karenge karne wale the aaj sir payment.
Customer: Karne wale the.
Executive: To sir ka number kaun sa hai?
Customer: Actually sir abhi office me hai to sir ye number hai sir ka.
Executive: Accha accha accha.
Customer: Ha to wo subah ke time sirf mere paas me rehta hai Sunday ke din sir ke paas me rehta hai aur sham me sir ke paas me rehta hai.
Executive: Okay okay.
Executive: Thik hai to kitne baje connect karna lunch ke baad kara dijiye fir isko.
Customer: Ha to sir ko me call karti hu agar sir free hote hai to me aapki baat karati hu okay abhi 5 minute me call karke bolti hu sir aapko me okay.
Executive: Thik hai na sir ke liye na ek additional benefit bhi karwa diya hai to agar baat ho jaye to subah subah hamara sara discussion ho rakha hai 5 minute ka kam hai karke UPI vagaira se payment ho jata aur aapka verification bhi karwa denge.
Customer: Barabar me ek minute me sir ka abhi thoda lunch time hoga to me call me la lo unko koi problem nahi.
Executive: Ha hold pe dal dijiye aap call me la lo unko koi problem nahi.
Customer: Chalega chalega okay okay sir okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants details about TrustSeal subscription.

- Wants to confirm the payment details.

- Wants to know the executive is calling regarding.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about TrustSeal subscription.

- Executive informed about payment and verification process.

- Executive confirmed to call back after 5 minutes.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, subscription, payment, verification
